name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

actions.name: Maul
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Strike {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10 damage) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
